text.more: Click on a node to show more info about it! This app shows how all courses at Stanford are related to each other! Each node represents a course, and the edges leading away from it show which other courses it is a prerequisite for. Template for web visualization provided by InteractiveVis project

text.title: Stanford Cardinal Direction
